name: Goniometer Kit
descr: This carrying case contains the most frequently requested stainless steel and x-ray goniometers. This set includes: robinson pocket goniometer 15cm - 180° / stainless steel goniometer 35cm - 180° / stainless steel goniometer 35cm - 360° / stainless steel finger goniometer 12cm / x-ray goniometer 20cm - 180° / stainless steel goniometer 20cm - 180°
